short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add your Mood/Progress/Fellings for the day

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Progress Pulse: A daily mood/ feelings tracker**

Welcome to Progress Pulse, your serene space in the digital realm. This Chrome extension transforms your browsing experience into a dreamy journey, blending productivity with peace of mind.

**Key Features:**

1. **Calendar Integration:** Effortlessly organize your days with our intuitive calendar. Track your daily progress, set goals, and navigate your schedule with ease.

2. **Mood Tracking:** Capture your daily mood and reflect on your emotional well-being. Progress Pulse helps you stay mindful of your feelings and fosters a positive mindset.

3. **Seamless Design:** Our minimalistic design promotes a clutter-free environment. The user-friendly interface ensures a smooth and enjoyable browsing experience.

4. **Goal Setting:** Set and achieve personal goals with the extension. Whether it's work-related milestones or personal aspirations, our extension keeps you focused on what matters most.



**Support the Progress Pulse Project:**

If you find joy in Progress Pulse, consider supporting us with a virtual coffee. Your contribution helps us continue developing features to make your browsing experience even more delightful.

(https://www.buymeacoffee.com/mehtamegha)

Download Progress Pulse now and turn your Chrome into a dreamy haven for productivity and peace. Embrace a mindful digital lifestyle with Progress Pulse!

Upcoming Features
- ML model to track your text inputs and give a graphical feedback and score for your day, week, month and year.

-Connections with like minded people across the world
